dialogues.text: No, we should reach the base of the Brain shortly. And from there, it's not far to the site of the injury.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, light pours in. Astonished, Grant sees:

dialogues.speaker: HUGE OVAL MEMBRANE
dialogues.text: Semi-transparent. The immense pillars which form the Stap Inner Ear are illuminated by the light behind it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) Where's that light coming from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) The outside world. Filtering in through Benes' Eardrum...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duval bends over the chart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing; to Michaels) That puts us right here... Which means we can head straight for the Sub Arachnoid Cavity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we can go in past the Oculomotor Nerve...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As both men remain bent over the chart, conferring, Grant

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cora is lying on the cot. As Grant enters, she starts to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No need to get up --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I feel much better now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But she remains seated, still weak. As the light grows br

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quietly) The outside world... I thought I'd never see it again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant stops at the laser which is fastened securely, runs along it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turning to Grant) Thank you for saving my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what they pay me for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A great deal more than that, I believe...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up from the laser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Such as?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keeping an eye on Dr. Duval...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into the silence) What gives you that idea?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light now dims back to normal, indicating they have p Eardrum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why you're really here. I knew it from the start.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As obvious as that? Our Security people will jump for joy. (with smile) I suppose Duval's onto me, too?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not the first, but he's much too innocent, much too involved with his work, to realize what's going on around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Under a cloud without cause, I take it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no. Plenty of cause. He won't follow the herd, or change his convictions -- even when they're not popular. And he believes in an absolutely free interchange of information between scientists of different countries -- and these days, there's nothing more suspicious than that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Depends on which end of the telescope you look through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, if you happen to be very fond of him -- even in love with him -- it would certainly affect your point of view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before she can answer, they hear:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) It's out of the question.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) Now be reasonable!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds like trouble...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two move toward the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant and Cora silently witness:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's against my better Judgment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better Judgment?! To wait until the actual operation -- when it may be too late?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've done all I could with the laser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All I'm asking is you test it beforehand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it won't work, it's beyond my power to fix it. But if it does, there's no telling how long it will hold up. It's a jury rig, at best, and we'll need every second of use we can get out of it. That's why I don't want to put any extra strain on the connections by running unnecessary tests.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Duvall I insist you test the laser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (angrily) I'll do nothing of the sort! The operation is <my> responsibility! I won't do it, and that's final!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (controlling himself with difficulty) As usual, you want everything your way. Except this time there's more than your damned ego at stake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tightly) I know only too well what's in the balance, Doctor. And it's not my ego, damned or otherwise.

dialogues.speaker: GRANT
dialogues.text: Looking thoughtfully after Duval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reid and Carter are relieved to hear:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Proteus turning into Quadrant 791 Level F.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reid presses button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still in tableau. All hear:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) The Proteus has passed the Inner Ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instantly the tension breaks. There is coughing, clearing Someone sneezes, evoking:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --        Just in time! I couldn't hold it back another second! --        I was afraid to <breathe>! --        My foot's asleep. --        Only one? --        I thought I'd die when the scissors hit the floor!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Female Surgical Aide picks up the scissors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reid is moving to the window overlooking the MAIN OPS ROO turns from the Minute Recorder, which now reads <8>.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on edge) Only eight minutes left...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he joins Reid and both look down into the MAIN OPS ROO the Grid Officer moving the Proteus to the Quadrant at th Brain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (softly) Imagine -- they're in the Human Mind --

dialogues.speaker: CEREBRAL LIGHTS
dialogues.text: A dazzling display of flashing lights fills the screen. T CAMERA PANS DOWN slowly, we see a high wall of complex ci which the tiny lights glow on and off rapidly. Finally, a NEARS the bottom, it reveals:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sub seems a mere speck as it cruises through a chasm walls of similar circuitry and electronic pyrotechnics. T sense of order despite the complexity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant has joined Cora and Duval at the bow. The three are impressed and moved by what they see. Michaels remains at As they look on:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (softly) "Yet all the suns that light the Corridors of the Universe shine dim, Before the blazing of a Single Thought -- "

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Proclaiming in incandescent glory The myriad Mind of Man..."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cora looks at Grant in rather surprised awareness of this of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very poetic, gentlemen. You seem to see a great deal out there. Let me know when we pass the Soul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duval turns from the bow windows to face Michaels with th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quietly) The Soul? The finite mind cannot comprehend Infinity. And the Soul which comes from God is Infinite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take a close look at your Soul, and your Infinity, and your God out there --

dialogues.speaker: GRANT
dialogues.text: In thoughtful response to:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) -- and you'll find it's nothing but a combination of atoms, molecules --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not letting Duval interrupt:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --and certain chemicals involving proteins --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You left something out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (flatly) The Breath of God...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Michaels can reply:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (from Bubble) Doctor -- what's that up ahead?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn toward bow, see:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it comes into view with the sub turning the corner of huge semi-circular area of branchlike nerves, through whi cerebral lights flash. In the center is the site of the i lights stop at its perimeter, as if short-circuited, caus area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (up at Bubble) There it is. That's the site of the injury -- the dark spot. We'd better get prepared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They move into the Lab Section, where they put on their B quickly during:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too late...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Startled, they follow his look, see the Minute Recorder n

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You couldn't possibly operate and get out before the hour's up. (up at Bubble) Captain, keep going. Head for the Removal Point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He begins to spread out a map of the Removal Area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Removal Point? What're you talking about!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have no alternative. With only six minutes left, we'll just barely make it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (up at Bubble) Hold it, Skipper. (to Michaels) What happens if we overstay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once time's up, De-Miniaturization begins. In a matter of seconds the ship will grow big enough to become a danger to the System. Then White Corpuscles will swarm to destroy it, as they would any invader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (up at Bubble) How long will it take to get from here to the Removal Point?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (from above) Approximately two minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That still leaves me four minutes to operate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All you'll succeed in doing is getting us trapped! (glancing at Minute Recorder) Captain, you will proceed immediately to the Removal Point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (from above) Yes sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant moves quickly to the Manual Panel and throws some k into the OFF position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Owens is startled to see the lights over the buttons go o the controls inoperative. The sub comes to a stop at some from the Forest of Dendrites and the dark area up ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My power's gone! (looks down, sees him) Grant -- what're you doing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With manner of taking over:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the laser, Dr. Duval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Duval and Cora move quickly into the Lab Section:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (furiously) I'm in charge of this mission! You were instructed to take orders from me, not give them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, but the situation has changed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing has changed as far as <my> authority goes! He is <not> going to operate! Not in the little time we have left! There's no chance of success! It's sheer suicide for all of us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He breaks off as Duval and Cora come out of the Lab Secti the laser and power unit. As they move to the Escape Hatc Grant opens:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (furiously) Dr. Duval, you are not going through with this! I absolutely forbid it! I'm responsible for the lives of everyone here! I will not allow you or anyone else to leave this ship!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to do what I can to save Benes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He steps into the Escape Hatch with Cora. Grant closes th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rageng at Grant) You fool! Don't you see what you've done? You've given him a perfect opportunity to kill Benes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights start flashing red, indicating the Escape Hatc flooded. Grant puts on his Breather Pack during:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't believe that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? Because of his gibberish about GOd and the Soul? Camouflage -- that's all it is -- to blind the gullible like you! And to hide his real identity -- a fanatic whose only purpose is to kill Benes! And you made it possible!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light over the Escape Hatch turns green. As Grant ope

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've come up against fanatics before, and Duval just doesn't fit the pattern. (up at Bubble) I'm going out there, Skipper. Maybe I can be of some help...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember -- we can't take more than five minutes to get out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Grant starts closing the door, he glances at:

dialogues.speaker: 551B MINUTE RECORDER
dialogues.text: It now reads <5>.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant closes the door. The light over it flashes red. Mic to the bow window to observe:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duval and Cora are swimming toward the dark spot with the the power unit. They reach:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Grant drops out and starts toward Duval and Cora.

dialogues.speaker: SECTION OF THROMBUS IN BRAIN
dialogues.text: The laser beam is slowly dissolving away a small portion darkness. Grant swims up. He glances at his wrist watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How does it look, Doctor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (as he works) If I can relieve the pressure on a few key vessels...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More of the dark area lights up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watching, Michaels responds grimly to the increasing numb flashing lights in the injured area. He turns with grim r from the bow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (up at Bubble) Skipper...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Owens is startled to hear:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (from below) There seems to be something wrong with the Escape Hatch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (from below; imperatively) Fluid is seeping through. Better come down and have a look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quickly, Owens starts slipping out of his harness, starts ladder leading into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michaels is not visible in the angle of the shot as Owens Escape Hatch, looking for the seepage. Seeing nothing wro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turning; puzzled) I don't see any sign of --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He breaks off, his expression reflecting horrified surpri wielding the heavy crank of the winch smashes down on his he has a chance to dodge it. Owens slumps to the floor at

dialogues.speaker: MICHAELS
dialogues.text: He drops the heavy tool, goes quickly to the Manual Panel switches back into the ON position, restoring all the con where they were before Grant changed them. Then he climbs

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights over the buttons are all on again, indicating are in working order. As Michaels sits down hastily and b into the harness, with him we see:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duval is aiming the laser in short bursts at a dark area large Central Nerve. Grant glances at his wrist watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doctor, we've just about had it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It I can clear this Central Nerve, that <may> be enough...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unseen by them:

dialogues.speaker: PROTEUS
dialogues.text: In the distance it is swinging around in a wide arc <abov

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Michaels maneuvers into position, he responds grimly t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Light begins to play along sections of the Central Nerve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bow is now lined up straight with the Central Nerve. Michaels presses the FULL SPEED button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The churning indicates full power is on. The Proteus spur speeding toward:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More and more of the Central Nerve lights up as the inter darkness is dissolved by precise bursts of the laser beam the oncoming sub, Duval and Cora keep working. As Grant g wrist watch, electrical impulses begin racing in a contin through the Central Nerve, which is now incandescent alon height.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That should be enough...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks critically at the results, as he normally would.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We better get back to the sub. Every second counts now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (suddenly) Look! They follow the direction of her glance, are startled to see:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Speeding directly toward the Central Nerve high above the in the Bubble is indeterminate at the distance and angle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) It's heading right for the Nerve!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s., confused) I don't understand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they watch helplessly:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (getting idea) The laser! Let me have the laser!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant grabs the laser from Duval. With Cora trailing, hol power unit, Grant leads the way upward at an angle to int

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is speeding toward the Central Nerve like a projectile a target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The incandescent Central Nerve looms closer and closer. M the controls in place with the fixed look of a pilot on a course.

dialogues.speaker: GRANT, CORA AND PROTEUS
dialogues.text: He stops swimming. She remains near him. The sub is now o heads, at an angle which makes the rudder visible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me your widest beam! Full power!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cora turns a dial on the power unit. Grant takes careful beam shoots out from the laser, across the intervening di hits:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The concentrated light disintegrates the rudder and burns section of the hull.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fluid pours through the hole into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The intact section with its trapped air holds off total i The unconscious Owens stirs, face up, the liquid just sho covering him. The sub begins to keel, owing to the inflow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michaels wrestles with the controls, trying to keep on co Central Nerve ahead looms closer and closer. For a moment he will be able to ram it. But the increasing tilt sudden

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To dive at a sharp angle, just barely missing the Central

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michaels wrestles with the controls, but to no avail. Thr Bubble, he is startled to see:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looms closer and closer as the Proteus dives inexorabl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Treelike branching nerves form an intricate mesh as if in forest. The Proteus careens into it, tearing loose a sect fibers. The sub keels over on one side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now at a sharp tilt. The impact causes one of the arms of chair to spring out of place, pinning Michaels to the sea an angle, he struggles to break loose, without avail. Sud startled eyes fix on:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It flashes <0>. The lights begin to dim.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flashing <0>. The SOUND of a warning siren is on loud. It during the scene, adding urgency to the reactions of all. Carter exchange grim looks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time's up... We'll have to take them out immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It means killing Benes... (savagely) And for all we know, they may have completed the operation! (slamming table) Damn it to hell!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns away. Reid goes to the window overlooking the OP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remove the Proteus...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment only the undulating wail of the warning sire Then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prepare for trepanation...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the Surgical Technicians begins swabbing Benes' he alcohol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights are almost out. It is now lit only by the eeri pulsing flashes in the Forest of Dendrites. Michaels is v to pry the steel arm loose, but it holds him in a vise-li the chair. He looks fearfully toward the bow window, as i what to expect next.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant, Duval and Cora are swimming through the maze of ne the sub lying at a sharp keel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship's good as finished. We'll have to get out on our own! Is there a quick way out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We could follow the Optic Nerve to the corner of the Eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's beginning to grow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stop, treading water as they see:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Growing visibly before their eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Michaels reacts as he sees the dendrites outside growing which indicates the sub and he are growing larger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to get them out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he starts toward the sub, Grant stops him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They follow his look, see:

dialogues.speaker: WHITE CORPUSCLES
dialogues.text: Huge monster-like blobs are starting to ooze through the the Proteus, which is now about a quarter as large as whe and growing rapidly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s., horrified) White Corpuscles!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'll ingest the ship and everything in it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay here, both of you. Hold them off, if you can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands the laser to Duval and starts swimming toward:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The White Corpuscles are slithering through the interlace They are still some distance from the disabled sub.

dialogues.speaker: MICHAELS
dialogues.text: He is horrified to see the White Corpuscles slide into hi though still removed from the sub. He renews his frantic break loose from the steel grip of the sprung arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant swims the hole through into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quickly he makes his way through the narrow flooded area, two Breather Packs en route.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant emerges into the air-filled portion, pushes up his takes in the prone Owens and Michaels pinned in the Bubbl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (frantically) Grant! Help!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment Grant stands between the unconscious man and trapped in the Bubble. Then he hurriedly unzips Owens' ju revealing the swim suit beneath. Owens regains consciousn the above:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in a daze) Dr. Michaels... He went berserk...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with realization) Berserk nothing. He's the one who's been sabotaging the mission... (handing him Breather Pack) Get this on. Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (from Bubble; frantically) Grant!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A monster-like cell is slithering toward the Bubble. Mich tearing at the steel arm that holds him to the chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with growing terror) Macrophages!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moving against the extreme tilt, Grant appears. Respondin oncoming White Corpuscle, Grant pulls at the steel arm wi strength.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (during above) Get me out of here. Get me out!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For all his effort, Grant is unable to free Michaels.

dialogues.speaker: 602FF WHITE CORPUSCLE
dialogues.text: Gradually oozes over the entire Bubble, covering it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant makes a last desperate effort to free Michaels as h Bubble begin to dissolve beneath the body of the adhering Corpuscle. As the fluid body begins flowing over Michaels

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in terror) No...no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His scream is cut off by the White Corpuscle engulfing hi jumps back into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on -- it's no use!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can get out through the Lab Section.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both pull down their swim masks. Owens moves off, followe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Owens is swimming through the hole. Grant follows through area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Owens appears, swims off toward Duval and Cora. The two a the laser and power unit. Duval is hitting the White Corp dissolving them in an attempt to keep them off the sub, b avail. The monster cells are swarming in greater numbers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A monster White Corpuscle is flowing along it, down towar As Grant now emerges, the White Corpuscle grasps him in i

dialogues.speaker: 602E GRANT AND WHITE CORPUSCLE
dialogues.text: He struggles, unable to break out of the fluid mass which

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duval and Cora swim up. Duval aims the laser, presses the beam shoots out with surgical precision, making a direct

dialogues.speaker: 602G VACUOLE OF WHITE CORPUSCLE
dialogues.text: The nucleus of the monster cell disintegrates, releasing swims quickly toward:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three see another White Corpuscle moving after Grant. dissolves it just as the laser goes dead. As Grant reache

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said there was a quick way out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Dr. Michaels?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too late!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Duval drops the laser, turns and starts to swim off. Cora power unit. With Duval in the lead, they swim as fast as through:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dendrites are now <smaller> in relat1on to the four a on through the Cranial Region of flashing lights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: White Corpuscles are now festooned all over the sub and f through the Bubble and damaged portion of the hull.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The swimmers look back and respond to:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is crumbling like the Hindenburg Zeppelin. The White C swarming over the remains, ingesting every particle.

dialogues.speaker: 607B THE GROUP
dialogues.text: Reacting to the destructive power of these internal defen swim off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chief Surgeon's gloves are on. Now all start to take around the Operating Table. The operating beams are switc Chief Surgeon holds out one hand. A Surgical Nurse slaps into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Standing at the window overlooking the OPERATING ROOM, Ca can see the Chief Surgeon bending down over Benes' head, an incision. Carter suddenly gets an idea, presses button

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold it, Doctor!

dialogues.speaker: 616C BENES' HEAD AND SCALPEL
dialogues.text: The cutting edge is a fraction of an inch from the shaved stops just in time. The Chief Surgeon and the Surgical Te table look up toward the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reid looks tensely at Carter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That blip we're picking up might only be the radio-active particle. The Proteus may already be destroyed...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you getting at?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (thoughtfully) If I were in their place and I'd run out of time, I'd abandon the ship before I grew to dangerous size... and use the few extra minutes to get out the quickest way possible, on my own...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with quick realization) Along the Optic Nerve to the Eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Swiftly, Reid crosses to the window overlooking the OPERA presses button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chief Surgeon and the others exchange tense looks as

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) Wait thirty seconds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rushes through the door leading down to the Operating

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Composed of a cobweb of fibers. Sausage-like links, pinch center, compose the walls of the winding passage. These a of Ranvier. Intermittent flashes leap across the Nodes, o intensity and duration.

dialogues.speaker: THE GROUP
dialogues.text: As he keeps swimming, Duval turns his head to the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (encouragingly) Light impulses -- on the way to the Brain! We're nearing the Eye!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They swim on with renewed effort. They are now larger in what they pass. Cora starts to fall behind, unable to mai pace, for all her valiant effort. Grant puts one arm arou and thus manages to keep after Duval and Owens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The four climb up on what appears to be the top of a huge mound. The fluid is rapidly seeping upward from the chann low-domed ceiling -- the inside of the Eyelid -- which is a crack, necessitates their crawling over the mound towar which affords more height. They force themselves along ex reach:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The four reach the grotto-like niche, where they can stan their increased size. As they rise from their crawling po lean panting in exhaustion against the wall:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reid wheels over a magnifying glass mounted on a stand. H and pries open Benes' right Eyelid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The four, their breath now regained, react in response to unexpected:

dialogues.speaker: PARTING OF RIGHT EYELIDS
dialogues.text: The bisected dome above them parts like the walls of the Simultaneously the beam of the operating lights blaze in intensity, causing the four to shield their eyes and look the retina.

dialogues.speaker: 642A KALEIDOSCOPIC EFFECT
dialogues.text: A symphony of colors is reflecting from the cones far ben the VITREOUS BODY and the manifold furrows of the IRIS.

dialogues.speaker: REID
dialogues.text: He is bringing the magnifying glass into focal position. through it, he reacts on seeing:

dialogues.speaker: THE FOUR
dialogues.text: Now magnified, we see the four figures being swept inexor the far corner of the Eye by a flood of water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (o.s.) A glass slide! Quick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the magnifying glass, we see their frantic attemp the sweep of the cascade. Just as the four near the fall- where the corner of the lids Join, the magnified end of a comes into view and catches the teardrop -- with the four

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reid carefully straightens up, holding the glass slide. H see:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tiny specks are visible in the teardrop, moving about in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All respond to Reid's imperative:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open those doors!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holding the slide so the teardrop doesn't spill, Reid mov through the sliding doors into the Miniaturization Room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter rushes to the window overlooking the MINIATURIZATI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All group around in silence, holding their breath as Reid and carefully bends down and places the glass slide on th Above, at the window, Carter can be seen looking down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tiny spots are growing visibly before our eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carter, looking down into the MINIATURIZATION ROOM, react dots below on the glass slide continue to grow and grow t where they can be discerned on the platform, and a bedrag it is. They look like survivors of a shipwreck: dripping exhausted, all the fight knocked out of them. Owens is se between his drawn-up knees; Cora is leaning against Grant Duval is fighting for breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now fully grown, the four look about, amazed at where the the Surgical Team and Reid encircling them are staring wi confoundment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant and Owens are driving a scooter. Both are rested, f groomed. The scooter goes through door marked:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scooter stops in:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They alight and go through door leading into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Grant and Owens enter, they see Benes is propped up on with Carter, Duval, Cora and Reid grouped around him. Gra immediately to Benes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (warmly; extending hand) Hello, Mr. Benes... How's the prize patient?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benes smiles as they shake hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beaming) He's making a fine recovery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He certainly is. He should be up and about in no time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant and Owens look toward Carter, who is pacing, visibl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (answering their look) Oh yes, great. The only problem is, he can't remember what he came to tell us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't remember?... What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's blanked out on that one particular point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, he can remember everything -- except how to control De- Miniaturization...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After all that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A specific area of memory may have been destroyed by the laser beam when Dr. Michaels interfered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As long as it isn't a certainty, we've got to try everything possible to make him remember!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, if you have no further need for me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, we'd like to get moving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mind only on Benes) Why don't you go on. We'll meet you at the Clearance Desk in a few minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He paces, looking at Benes while:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good-bye, Mr. Benes. I must say it's been quite an experience knowing you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benes smiles weakly at the double-entendre. As Grant star Owens:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now how soon can we try Sodium Pentathol?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd hold that off awhile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, how about hypnosis? That can't hurt him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Benes closes his eyes wearily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suggest the first thing we try is letting the patient get some rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he starts herding them out and they reach the door, th startled by a loud CRASH o.s. They rush out.

dialogues.speaker: TWO SCOOTERS
dialogues.text: Another scooter has run into the one containing Grant and such impact that the two have been tossed out. The M.P. i whistle, stopping all traffic.

dialogues.speaker: THE GROUP
dialogues.text: Carter, Reid, Duval and Cora are running toward:

dialogues.speaker: THE INTERSECTION
dialogues.text: Grant is rising, holding the side of his head. Owens, daz uninjured, is also getting up. As the others reach them:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (of Grant) He may have a head injury! (to Reid) Get him to the hospital!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instantly, Grant grabs Owens and hustles him to their sco

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who, me? Oh, no! Don't bother about me! We're not hurt! Isn't that right, Skipper?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dazed) Uh -- what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (getting him into scooter) We feel great, don't we? Just <great>?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (catching on) Oh -- sure, sure! Never better!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (taking off) Nothing wrong with us! Not a thing! We're fine -- just fine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In his haste, he almost runs into another scooter but ave by a matter of inches. He keeps going at top speed, by-pa stopped traffic by traveling in the wrong lane.

dialogues.speaker: SCOOTER
dialogues.text: As it is lost to view down the long corridor...
